english.segment1: and i will rise. with the GOD of love. and you will shine. in the spirit i cried. once twined to this world. that i don't deny he shall
english.segment2: rise, rise, rise. break the bones. rise, rise, rise. break the bones and you shine
english.segment3: check one, two listen up. what i inhale and what i breath(x3). is the spirit of life that lives in me. what i inhale and what i breath(x3). and the son of love shall
english.segment4: rise, rise, rise. break the bones. rise, rise, rise. break the bones and you shine
english.segment5: but one day the son of love shall rise. but when will you rise up. i see CHRIST. but when will you rise
english.segment6: rise, rise, rise. break the bones. shine
